tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MaintenanceSchedules (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoTDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_status VARCHAR(50),
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES maintenance_schedule(schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE iot_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    schedule_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES iot_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    log_description TEXT,
    log_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES maintenance_schedules(schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE device (
   device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   device_name VARCHAR(50),
   device_type VARCHAR(50),
   condition VARCHAR(50),
   last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
   schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   device_id INT,
   maintenance_date DATE,
   maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
   completed BOOLEAN
);
